attributes.action: employ 12- 15 year olds in small jobs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think its so mean expecting parents to buy all the fancy things kids want on top of the things they need. 12-15 year olds talents are completely wasted. They could quite easily stack shelves or label products or hang clothes on rails, and would be more than happy to work for the minimum wage. These kids need something to do to get them off the streets, and some idea of what work is like when having a nice home depends on it.
